column2: you can either get two sides or a soup. In terms of soup
column3: I've only had the lemongrass chicken
column4: which is pretty good and tastes like something I'd be able to find in a Thai restaurant. The sides
column6: are pretty meh. Tuscan Kale - been there
column8: but healthy. Couscous - pretty similar to the quinoa
column9: just less healthy. Acorn Squash - was this picked out of indian food
column10: cause i'm definitely leaving with some masala-y breath. It's alright
column11: just wash it down with some mintade - my favorite drink ever!
